channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep crevice in the road, 3rd February
item.description:
Roughly outside number 18 there is a deep crevice / crack across the road as you head towards Hucclecote Lane. Hit this on a bike and it almost caused me to lose control and fall off.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colwell Avenue, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple pot holes which drivers are swerving to avoid, 3rd February
item.description:
There are multiple deep potholes from the Racecourse Roundabout down Swindon Lane to the junction of Tommy Taylor's Lane, these are very deep, vehicles are swearing to the other side of the road to avoid damaging their cars, which is a serious hazard. I last used this Road on Sunday, now will have to avoid until aware that pot holes have been addressed due to danger and potential damage to car.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Drains, 3rd February
item.description:
Both the drains are blocked on the Gretton road outside 76 and 80a Gretton Road. Both appear blocked by rubble causing flooding during rain.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole around drain covers on Stoke Road - has caused tyre blowout, 3rd February
item.description:
Drain covers between Cheltenham North RFC and the first entrance to the Grundon Wingmoor Farm site.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large ppothole at entrance to traveler site, 3rd February
item.description:
